name: typemill
tagline: A flat file CMS for documentation and small websites
description: Typemill is a self-hosted flat-file CMS optimized for documentation and small websites. It provides a Markdown editor, navigation management, and themes through a straightforward web interface.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Store content in Markdown files without requiring a database for simplicity

features.title: Markdown Editor
features.description: Write and edit content using Markdown with live preview and formatting toolbar

features.title: Navigation Management
features.description: Organize pages in hierarchical structures with drag-and-drop reordering

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Customize appearance with themes or create your own for unique designs

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with plugins for forms, galleries, and other features

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Optimized for creating documentation sites with version control and search

features.title: User Management
features.description: Support multiple authors with role-based permissions for content management

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and manage images and files through a built-in media manager
